main event: A green-colored light the size of a baseball was observed moving erratically in the sky near Cloquet, Minnesota on January 3, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as very bright and moving at high altitude.
The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes.
The object's movement was described as erratic.
The sighting corresponded with other observations in the same general area on the same date.
Additional details were requested from the witness about the location, altitude, and course of the object.
sighted object: green-colored light the size of a baseball
